data.title: CRYTEK UK LIMITED company key information
data.meta_description: CRYTEK UK LIMITED is a Private limited company (Ltd.) company based in 122 CANAL STREET NOTTINGHAM, United Kingdom, which employs 6 people. The company started trading on 23 January 2009. The company registration number is 06800057, It’s main line of business activity is Business and domestic software development, and the company is listed as Inactive. According to the latest confirmation statements submitted on the 2012-12-31, there are currently 6 directors.
data.text:
Financial statements of CRYTEK UK LIMITED

According to CRYTEK UK LIMITED latest financial report submitted on 2012-12-31, the company has a Turnover of £7M, Gross-Profit of £2M while the Cash is £31,000.00. Compared with the previous year, the company reported a Turnover increase of 14.71%, which is an equivalent of -968000. At the same time, the Gross-Profit went down by -10.38%, or by 197000.
